snippet: The commissioner of the New York Police Department did the right thing when he disbanded the unit that spied on law-abiding Muslim citizens.
abstract: Editorial applauds New York Police Commissioner William Bratton's actions in disbanding Demographics Unit, used to conduct spying program on city's Muslim population; holds Bratton and Mayor Bill de Blasio must follow up by reinstating legal provisions requiring high-level review of investigations into individuals or groups engaged in political activity; says such regulations, loosened after Sept 11 attacks, will help ensure investigations do not violate human rights.
lead_paragraph: The commissioner of the New York Police Department did the right thing when he disbanded the unit that spied on law-abiding Muslim citizens.
